cluster
*******


Description
===========

The OpenSearch service CLI provides access to OCI Search Service with
OpenSearch.


Available Commands
==================

* backup

* configureoutboundcluster

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* list-versions

* resizehorizontal

* resizevertical

* restore

* shapes-details

  * list

* update

* upgrade

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list
